incidents.name: 500 Error When Fetching Voice Recordings via the API

incident_updates.body: The API was degraded for 8 minutes between 12:37 and 12:45 Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced 500 errors when fetching voice recordings via the API. The issue has now been resolved.

We have addressed the issue causing data usage and billing report delays with Programmable Wireless SIM product. The missing usage records from affected data sessions have also been recovered. We will continue to monitor for service stability. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or sooner once more information becomes available.

We are experiencing data usage and billing report delays with the Programmable Wireless SIM product. The issue has no impact on connectivity. We are working on recovering the missing usage records. We will provide another update in 1 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We have identified the issue in the latest release of Authy Desktop for Windows Version 2.4.0. The version 2.4.0 is no longer available for downloading or uploading. The incident will be closed, however the team will continue to investigate the bug and release the fix as soon as possible.

incidents.name: Issues With Onboarding New Numbers or Deprovisioning 10DLC Numbers

incident_updates.body:
Engineers have concluded that the provisioning delay with the carrier will continue to be an ongoing issue. The wait time has improved since opening this issue, but on average the expected delay could be approximately 10 days for provisioning changes to take effect on the carrier side.

This delay may cause message delivery issues to and from T-Mobile subscribers for newly provisioned and deprovisioned lines. 

We will be closing this incident, but please be aware of the above details moving forward. Thank you for your patience with this investigation.

We continue to investigate delays when trying to onboard new numbers, or de-provisioning numbers on T-Mobile 10DLC A2P. We expect to provide another update on July 18th at 17:56 PT or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: 500 Errors When Using Lookup

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup was degraded for 22 minutes between 11:15 and 11:37 Pacific Time on July 17th. During this period of time, customers may have experienced 500 errors on Lookup. The issue has now been resolved.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with {Product}. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: 500 Error When Fetching Voice Recordings via the API

incident_updates.body: The API was degraded for 15 minutes between 11:50AM and 12:05PM Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced 500 errors when fetching voice recordings via the API. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to KTK Telecom in Russia

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to KTK Telecom in Russia. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays to KTK Telecom in Russia. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to KTK Telecom in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to KTK Telecom in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to KTK Telecom in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to KTK Telecom in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
